title: Looking for Silver/Bronze duo partner.
body:
Hi lads,

Last season was my first ranked season and got as far as my series to Silver 5 from a Bronze 2 placement. This season they seem to have thrown a curve ball with the ranking system, and it's fairly impossible to climb as fast as you fall with the amount of afk's and trolls etc.

This season I was unluckily placed in B5, but got as far as my series to Silver again, however I failed my series, and have drastically fallen back to B4.

I main mid {{champion:90}} 50 games in ranked, positive KDA (somewhere around 8.1/7/10, average of 180 cs and 65% win rate. 

But can also play {{champion:1}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:115}} {{champion:25}}  fairly well in mid. 

I can play {{champion:77}} {{champion:31}} {{champion:19}} {{champion:9}} well in the jgl.

I can play {{champion:31}} {{champion:36}} {{champion:41}} {{champion:1}} well top lane 

I can adc {{champion:222}} {{champion:104}} comfortably, but its not a preference.

And I can support {{champion:1}} {{champion:16}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:201}} {{champion:53}} quite well. 

A lot of other champs I can play kind of okay, but wouldnt try ranked queue with them unless I have worked on them. 

I know alot of other people are having the same struggle of placing back to where they were last season, and it's not because their playing badly themselves, it's quite frequently the people they get put with. 

If anyone's interested add GookSlayer69 (the name is a personal joke, and when I made it I intended to play league once and never return) and send a message when you see me online.

Cheers.

replies.body: Lol send me a request and I wanna I'll play a ranked game with you I fell from silver cause of trolls and feeders/afkers so ik tf so yea add me and play tonight if you can
